noun.description: An orthopteran insect of the family Acrididae, which includes locusts and typical (short-horned) grasshoppers.

adjective.description: Designating orthopteran insects of the family Acrididae; of or relating to these insects.

origin: Late 19th century. From scientific Latin Acrida, genus name + -id, after scientific Latin Acridiidae, family name.
